actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue and enforce, with respect to mushrooms, marketing orders that include terms providing for any form of marketing promotion, including paid advertising, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to provide for marketing orders applicable to mushrooms.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue and enforce, with respect to mushrooms, marketing orders that include terms providing for any form of marketing promotion, including paid advertising, and for other purposes.
